轃字的基本解释

轃
zhēn
古代大车底板上的竹木衬垫。
古通“臻”，至，到：“是时未轃夫甘泉也。”

轃字的汉语字典释义

[①]［zhēn］
［《廣韻》側詵切，平臻，莊。］
［《廣韻》則前切，平先，精。］
(1)古代大车上的竹木衬垫。
(2)同“臻”。至；到。

轃字的康熙字典解释

【酉集下】【車字部】　轃； 康熙笔画：17； 页码：页1247第31
【廣韻】【正韻】側詵切【集韻】【韻會】緇詵切，?音臻。【說文】大車簀也。　又與臻同。至也。【前漢·郊祀歌】四極爰轃。【王吉傳】福祿其轃。　【集韻】或作?。

考證：〔【前漢·廟祀歌】四極爰轃。〕　謹照原文廟改郊。
轃字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
轃字的起名意思

暂无。

Xu
Basic explanation of words
Xu
zhēn
Bamboo and wood liner on the floor of an ancient cart.
Gu Tong "Zhen", to, to: "It's not time for the husband and wife."
Xu
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［zhēn］
["Guangyun" side-cut, Pingzhen, Zhuang. ]
["Guangyun" cuts forward, flat first, and refined. ]
(1) Bamboo and wood lining on ancient carts.
(2) Same as "Zhen". To; to.
Xu

[You Ji 2] [Che Zi Department] 　轃; Kangxi strokes: 17; Page number: page 1247 31
[Guang Yun] [Zheng Yun] Side-cutting [Jiyun] [Yunhui] 缁诜切，? Yin Zhen. [Said the text] Da Che Yan also.　The same with Zhen again. To also. [Pre-Han · Jiao Si Song] Four poles 爰轃. [Wang Ji Biography] Fu Lu Qishe.　【Jiyun】or make?. Textual research: [[Previous Han·Temple Sacrifice Songs] Four Extremes 爰轃. 〕 　 I would like to change the outskirts of the temple according to the original.
